content.question: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Reynolds makes to develop her argument that Iowans should focus on helping their communities.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Reynolds makes to develop her argument that Iowans should focus on helping their communities.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
